abstract: People are far more tolerant of ads when they accompany professionally created content than when they come with homemade video, according to a new survey.
snippet: People are far more tolerant of ads when they accompany professionally created content than when they come with homemade video, according to a new survey.
lead_paragraph: What kind of online videos are people willing to sit through ads for? The question is particularly urgent for companies like YouTube that have vast troves of videos but, for the most part, few ways to squeeze money out of them.

headline.main: Web Videos Where Ads Are Acceptable
headline.print_headline: Web Videos Where Ads Are Acceptable
